name: One Lit Party
description:
Created for the Global Game Jam 2017.

You've washed up on a house boat, and the party is on! Only one problem - there's fires everywhere, and nobody seems to care! Can you put out the fires in time to save the party? And will anybody show some gratitude? Find out in... ONE LIT PARTY!!!

Creators:

Alexis Chipperini

Brett Davis

Kyle Fleischer

Patrick Gallagher

Sam Shapiro
